T03D3788:56a-11: pa'i rten yin pa'i phyir kun shes par bya ba'o
T03D3788:56a-12: // bsams pa las byung ba'i shes pa phun sum
T03D3788:56a-13: tshogs pa'i rten yin pa'i phyir rnam par rig par
T03D3788:56a-14: // bya ba'o // slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud mi

T03D3788:56a-16: // bya ba'o // gsal ba'o // rang gi don

T03D3788:56a-23: // // bsam du rung ba'i chos rnams yang dag

T03D3788:56a-28: mu stegs byed kyi tshogs thams cad skrag par mdzad pa'i phyir seng ge'i shugs so //

T03D3788:56b-9: smad pas zhum pa mi mnga' ba'i phyir mi dma' ba'o //

T03D3788:56b-11: kyi mtshan nyid rjes su zhugs pa nyid yin pa'i
T03D3788:56b-12: phyir sgra thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa'o //
T03D3788:56b-13: bsnyel te gsungs ba mi mnga' ba'i phyir tshig zur chag pa med pa'o //

T03D3788:56b-17: bsnyengs pa dang bral ba'i phyir mi zhan pa'o //
T03D3788:56b-18: skyo ba med pa la mnga' brnyes pa'i phyir rab tu dga' ba'o //

T03D3788:57a-0: so // chos kyi 'khor lo lan gsum bskor ba rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi @57a * //

T03D3788:57a-8: de bzhin du bden pa re re zhing yang gsum dang /

T03D3788:57a-18: dngos po med pa ni gang zhig lags /

T03D3788:57b-6: yongs su shes par bya ba dang /

T03D3788:148b-0: don ma yin pa yang mi byed do zhes 'thad pa bstan pa @148b yin no //
T03D3788:148b-1: de ltar na chos thams cad kyi don dang don
T03D3788:148b-2: ma yin pa la spyod pa bkag pa yin no
T03D3788:148b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa mngon bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
T03D3788:148b-5: chos gang don du bya ba'am /
T03D3788:148b-6: don med par bya ba ma dmigs te /
T03D3788:148b-8: 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang mi byed pas /
T03D3788:148b-9: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don dang don mi byed pa bkag pas /
T03D3788:148b-10: 'phags pa thams cad 'dus ma byas kyi don gyis
T03D3788:148b-11: na de'i don nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'i dpes phan
T03D3788:148b-12: pa dang / gnod pa med pas don dang don
T03D3788:148b-13: ma yin pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis rnam
T03D3788:148b-14: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob pa nyid kyi
T03D3788:148b-15: phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03D3788:148b-16: gnyis su med pa ni gnyis su med pa ste /
T03D3788:148b-18: de la kun du rmongs pa ni gang gnyis su
T03D3788:148b-19: med pa'i chos kyis gnyis su med pa'i chos thob
T03D3788:148b-21: gnyis kyi chos shig gnyis kyi chos kyis thob pa bkag pa dang /
T03D3788:148b-22: gnyis dang gnyis su med pa'i chos mi dmigs pa
T03D3788:148b-23: na thob pa yin par bshad pa'i phyir ro zhes
T03D3788:148b-25: gang gi phyir ji ltar yin pa'i rnam par rtog
T03D3788:148b-26: pa'i dbye ba rgya cher bshad pas dngos po thams
T03D3788:148b-27: cad la mngon par zhen pa ni mi mthun pa'i
T03D3788:148b-29: rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dmigs su med pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03D3788:148b-30: de ltar byas na dngos po med pa la dmigs pa'i ye shes 'thad pa yin no //
T03D3788:148b-32: mya ngan las 'das pa med pa nyid kyis 'phags
T03D3788:148b-33: pa'i gang zag thams cad med par 'gyur zhes zhus
T03D3788:148b-34: pa la / thams cad 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'i phyir /
T03D3788:148b-35: 'dus ma byas pa ni 'byung ba med pa nyid
T03D3788:148b-36: kyis 'jig rten gyi mtshan mar byas pa yin no
T03D3788:148b-37: zhes bya ba ni lan yin no //
T03D3788:148b-39: don dam pa'i tshig gis don du btags pa med
T03D3788:148b-40: pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni 'thad pa yin
T03D3788:148b-41: no // phyi ma'i mtha' shes pas mtha' yongs su chad pa ni zhus pa yin la /
T03D3788:148b-42: rang gi mtshan nyid kyi chos rnams la de'i mtha'
T03D3788:148b-43: mi shes pas mi shes pa dang ldan pa la
T03D3788:148b-44: de bstan to zhes bya ba ni lan yin no
T03D3788:149a-1: med pa la dmigs pa'i ye shes ni 'thad pa yin no //
T03D3788:149a-2: de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
T03D3788:149a-3: dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can rnams kyi
T03D3788:149a-4: phyir / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
T03D3788:149a-5: pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug pa la
T03D3788:149a-6: sems can du btags pa yang mi dmigs shing /
T03D3788:149a-7: sems can du 'dzin pa las yongs su 'brel ba
T03D3788:149a-8: ni dka' ba byed pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs
T03D3788:149a-10: yams nad 'di rnams zad nas ni //
T03D3788:149a-11: yun ring lon nas dbugs phyin ltar //
T03D3788:149a-12: rnam pa kun du 'gro ba yi //
T03D3788:149a-13: bde bsgrub yon tan phun tshogs kun //
T03D3788:149a-14: rgya mtsho che la chu bo bzhin //
T03D3788:149a-15: 'bras bu mchog gis dpa' ba yi //
T03D3788:149a-16: sems dpa' chen po de la ni //
T03D3788:149a-17: rnam pa kun du rten par byed //
T03D3788:149a-19: gang ljang bu'i sdong bu dang /
T03D3788:149a-22: 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa'i dpes byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi zhing nyid yin pa'i phyir /
T03D3788:149a-23: 'gro ba ma lus pa'i bde ba'i longs spyod mchog mang zhing /
T03D3788:149a-24: sna tshogs pa'i don gyis na skyed mos tshal bzang
T03D3788:149a-25: po dang 'dra bar 'bras bu mchog gis dpa' zhing
T03D3788:149a-26: mdzes pa de lta bu de ni bzhin gshegs pa
T03D3788:149a-27: nyid du gzung bar bya ba yin no //
T03D3788:149a-29: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las rnam pa
T03D3788:149a-30: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'thob
T03D3788:149a-32: de ltar de bzhin nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa na /
T03D3788:149a-33: dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
T03D3788:149a-34: las rang gis byas pa dang /
T03D3788:149a-36: dus kyi ye shes rnam par dag pa dang /
T03D3788:149a-37: sems can rnams kyi don dang /
T03D3788:149a-38: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /
T03D3788:149a-39: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa dang /
T03D3788:149a-40: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
T03D3788:149a-41: sems can yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phan
T03D3788:149a-42: yon thob pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no
T03D3788:149a-45: skyes bu la la zhig ljang bu bskyed par 'dod la /
T03D3788:149a-46: skyes bu des ljang bu de'i rtsa ba ma dmigs /
T03D3788:149b-2: 'bras bu ma dmigs par ljang bu de'i sdong bu bskyed de /
T03D3788:149b-3: dus dus su chus bran zhing /
T03D3788:149b-4: de'i sdong bu de rim gyis yal ga dang /
T03D3788:149b-7: 'bras bu la spyod pa de bzhin du byang chub
T03D3788:149b-8: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang sems can
T03D3788:149b-9: rnams kyi phyir / bla na med pa yang dag
T03D3788:149b-10: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par 'jug
T03D3788:149b-11: rnams kyi phyir / ste / de dag rim gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing /
T03D3788:149b-12: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed de /
T03D3788:149b-15: 'bras bu ltar sems can thams cad 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
T03D3788:149b-16: de la lo ma ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
T03D3788:149b-17: dpa' chen po gang la brten cing sems can rnams
T03D3788:149b-18: ngan song gsum las yongs su sgrol ba'i //
T03D3788:149b-19: me tog ni gang la brten cing rgyal rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu nas /
T03D3788:149b-20: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi lha rnams su skye'o //
T03D3788:149b-21: de la 'bras bu ni 'di yin te /
T03D3788:149b-22: byang chub sems dpa' chen po gang la brten nas /
T03D3788:149b-23: sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nas dgra bcom pa dang /
T03D3788:149b-25: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rab tu gnas so //
T03D3788:149b-26: rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
T03D3788:149b-27: chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi 'bras bu
T03D3788:149b-28: mchog du 'gyur ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o
T03D3788:149b-30: rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa'i bsgom pa'i lam gyi
T03D3788:149b-31: mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rnam par rtog pa'i rnam
T03D3788:149b-33: / sangs rgyas nyid thob pa'i rtse mo'i de ma
T03D3788:149b-34: thag par chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yin pas
T03D3788:149b-36: bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin //
T03D3788:149b-37: stong dang stong gnyis gsum skye bo //
T03D3788:149b-38: slob ma'i phun sum tshogs pa dang //
T03D3788:149b-39: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med la //
T03D3788:149b-40: bkod pa'i dge rnam dper mdzad nas //
T03D3788:149b-41: bsod nams mang po nyid kyis ni //
T03D3788:149b-42: sangs rgyas nyid kyi bar med de //
T03D3788:149b-43: bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin //
T03D3788:149b-45: gang de ni stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'o 'jig
T03D3788:149b-46: rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed yod pa
T03D3788:150a-1: thams cad nyan thos kyis la gnas par gyur pa dang /
T03D3788:150a-2: rang sangs rgyas kyis la gnas par gyur pa bas /
T03D3788:150a-3: de rnams ni byang chub sems d'a las byung ba nyid kyis na /
T03D3788:150a-4: sems can thams cad la dmigs te /
T03D3788:150a-5: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni /
T03D3788:150a-6: bsod nams mang du 'phel ba nyid yin no //
T03D3788:150a-7: de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
T03D3788:150a-8: rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad dkar po
T03D3788:150a-9: rnam par mthong ba'i sa la bkod pa dang /
T03D3788:150a-10: de bzhin du rigs kyis dang /
T03D3788:150a-11: de bzhin du brgyad pa'i sa dang /
T03D3788:150a-12: de bzhin du mthong pa'i sa dang /
T03D3788:150a-13: de bzhin du bsrabs pa'i sa dang /
T03D3788:150a-14: de bzhin du 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang /
T03D3788:150a-15: byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang /
T03D3788:150a-16: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang /
T03D3788:150a-17: byang chub sems dpa'i skyen med par zhugs pa la
T03D3788:150a-18: bzhag pas bas byang chub sems pa'i byang chub la
T03D3788:150a-19: zhugs pa'i bsod nams mang du skye ba nyid kyis
T03D3788:150a-20: bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni de'i rjes
T03D3788:150a-21: thogs nyid la 'tshang rgya ba nyid yin par shes
T03D3788:150a-22: par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yin no
T03D3788:150a-23: // byang chub sems dpa' byang chub la zhugs pa
T03D3788:150a-24: ni 'bras bu bzhi'i gnas la zhugs par gyur pa
T03D3788:150a-25: yin gyi gnas brgyad pa la ni ma yin no
T03D3788:150a-26: // // de ji lar khong du chud par bya zhe na /
T03D3788:150a-27: gang gi phyir rjes thogs nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyad par smos te /
T03D3788:150a-28: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu zhugs
T03D3788:150a-29: pa rnam pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams ches
T03D3788:150a-30: mang du rab tu sdud pa nyid do zhes bstan
T03D3788:150a-31: pa yin no // yang ting nge 'dzin 'di'i rjes
T03D3788:150a-32: thogs la de ma thag pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir
T03D3788:150a-35: de ni rnam pa kun mkhyen nyid //
T03D3788:150a-37: rab 'byor 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin la bya'o //
T03D3788:150a-39: 'di yi dmigs pa dngos med de //
T03D3788:150a-40: bdag po dran pa yin par bzhed //
T03D3788:150a-41: rnam pa zhi nyid ces bya ba ni gang de'i dmigs pa dang /
T03D3788:150a-43: rnam pa la lan du dmigs pa ni dngos po med pa nyid yin pa dang /
T03D3788:150b-0: bdag po ni dran pa nyid @150b yin no //
T03D3788:150b-1: rnam pa ni zhi ba nyid yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03D3788:150b-2: 'gog pa shes pa'ang zhi ba nyid yin no zhe na /
T03D3788:150b-3: mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid pa yin zhes bya ba smos te /
T03D3788:150b-4: 'dis ni 'dir rang bzhin gyis zhi ba yin par
T03D3788:150b-5: bshad kyi dngos po 'gog pa'i zhi ba ni ma
T03D3788:150b-7: da ni log par rtog pa brjod par bya ba yin pas /
T03D3788:150b-9: rab tu smra rnams brgyud mar rgol //
T03D3788:150b-11: 'di la zhes bya ba ni gnas 'di la'o //
T03D3788:150b-12: rab tu smra rnams zhes bya ba ni log par zhugs pa rnams so //
T03D3788:150b-13: gcig nas gcig tu brgyud mar sna tshogs par rgol pa'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i rtogs pa'am /
T03D3788:150b-14: de la sel ba tsam du smra ba rgol zhing //
T03D3788:150b-15: tshig tu smra ba'i lam mthar thug pa med pas shar cher smra ba rtsod pa byed do //
T03D3788:150b-17: de'i phyir brjod pa yin te /
T03D3788:150b-18: dmigs pa 'thad dang de yi ni /
T03D3788:150b-19: ngo bo nyid nges bzung ba dang //
T03D3788:150b-20: rnam kun mkhyen nyid ye shes dang //
T03D3788:150b-21: dam pa'i don dang kun rdzob dang //
T03D3788:150b-22: sbyor dang dkon mchog gsum po dang //
T03D3788:150b-23: thabs dang bcas pa'i rtogs pa dang //
T03D3788:150b-24: phyin ci log ni lam bcas dang //
T03D3788:150b-25: gnyen po mi mthun phyogs dag dang //
T03D3788:150b-26: mtshan nyid dang ni bsgom pa la //
T03D3788:150b-27: smra ba rnams kyi log rtog pa //
T03D3788:150b-28: rnam pa kun mkhyen nyid rten can //
T03D3788:150b-29: rnam pa bcu drug dag tu bzhed //
T03D3788:150b-31: dbye ba bcu drug tu bzhed ces bya ba'i don no //
T03D3788:150b-32: de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
T03D3788:150b-33: rten pa'i dmigs pa 'thad pa la log par rtog
T03D3788:150b-34: pa ni gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
T03D3788:150b-35: kyi yum shes par bya ba'i phyir de nyid nas
T03D3788:150b-37: 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyang dngos po med pa nyid do //
T03D3788:150b-39: de'i ngo bo nyid med pas dngos po med pa'o zhes gsungs la /
T03D3788:150b-40: gzhan dag de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
T03D3788:150b-41: nyid yin par 'dri bar bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad
T03D3788:150b-42: du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ngo bo
T03D3788:150b-43: nyid ma mchis pa lags zhes zhus pa gang yin
T03D3788:150b-44: pa la / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'das pa'i ngo bo nyid med par bstan pas /
T03D3788:151a-0: chos thams cad ni dngos po med @151a * //
T03D3788:151a-1: pa'i ngo bo nyid de zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03D3788:151a-2: mi dmigs pa'i ngo bo nyid la log par rtog
T03D3788:151a-3: pa ni gang yang de rnams de bzhin nyid la
T03D3788:151a-4: sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid du med pa nyid dang
T03D3788:151a-5: / de lta yin na byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nas /
T03D3788:151a-6: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa med par zhus pa dang /
T03D3788:151a-7: rab 'byor chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du shes pa de nyid /
T03D3788:151a-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la
T03D3788:151a-9: mkhas pa ste zhes bya ba de ni lan yin
T03D3788:151a-10: no // yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa nas stobs dang /
T03D3788:151a-11: mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa thob kyi bar du
T03D3788:151a-12: dus de srid du byang chub kyi lam la yongs
T03D3788:151a-14: des pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /
T03D3788:151a-15: skad cig ma gcig dang yang dag par ldan pa'i
T03D3788:151a-16: shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
T03D3788:151a-18: bag chags kyis mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams
T03D3788:151a-19: cad mi skye bar spangs pas yongs su spong ba
T03D3788:151a-20: nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03D3788:151a-21: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes
T03D3788:151a-22: la log par rtog pa ni gang de nas sangs
T03D3788:151a-23: rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa na /
T03D3788:151a-24: dngos po dang dngos po med pa ma gzigs pas /
T03D3788:151a-25: pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa spyad pa nas /
T03D3788:151a-26: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa'i bar la spyod pa'i tshe /
T03D3788:151a-27: pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa dngos po
T03D3788:151a-28: dang dngos po med par yid la mi byed do
T03D3788:151a-30: 'di ltar chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
T03D3788:151a-31: 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad kyis kyang dgongs shing
T03D3788:151a-32: yid la ma byas pa nyid kyis chos rnams chos
T03D3788:151a-34: chos kyi chos la dngos po med pa'i bdag nyid dang ;
T03D3788:151a-35: / chos kyis chos la dngos po med par shes
T03D3788:151a-36: par bya ba la sogs pa mu bzhi'i tshul gyis
T03D3788:151a-37: / 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob nye bar bzung nas /
T03D3788:151a-38: dngos po dngos po med ces bya bar ston par
T03D3788:151a-39: rjes su gnang ba'i phyir ro zhes rjes su bstan
T03D3788:151b-0: pa yin no // bden pa gnyis la @151b log par rtog pa ni gang kun rdzob dang /
T03D3788:151b-1: don dam pa dag gis de bzhin nyid mngon par
T03D3788:151b-2: mi shes pa rnams kyi phyir dngos po dang dngos
T03D3788:151b-3: po med par ston par mdzad pa'i phyir ro zhes
T03D3788:151b-5: sbyor ba la sogs par rtogs pa ni gang byang
T03D3788:151b-6: chub kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba la gzugs nas
T03D3788:151b-7: 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams la spyod pa dang /
T03D3788:151b-8: rjes su spyod pa dag la gnyis su med cing
T03D3788:151b-9: gnyis su byar med pa ni byang chub kyi spyod
T03D3788:151b-10: pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03D3788:151b-11: sangs rgyas dkon mchog la log par rtog pa ni /
T03D3788:151b-12: gang sangs rgyas zhes bya pa ni yang dag pa'i
T03D3788:151b-13: don brjod pa la 'jug pa'i rgyu yin par bstan
T03D3788:151b-14: pa dang / yang dag pa'i chos la mngon par rtogs pa dang /
T03D3788:151b-15: yang dag pa'i don rab tu rtogs pa dang /
T03D3788:151b-16: chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mngon bar
T03D3788:151b-17: rtogs pa'i go rims bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa
T03D3788:151b-18: gsum gyi dbang du mdzad nas /
T03D3788:151b-19: sangs rgyas zhes brjod pa 'jug pa'i rgyu yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03D3788:151b-20: chos dkon mchog la log par rtog pa ni gang
T03D3788:151b-21: byang chub ces bya ba'i tshig bla dags lus pa
T03D3788:151b-22: la / stong pa nyid la sogs pa byang chub kyi tshig bla dags nyid yin pa dang /
T03D3788:151b-23: yang byang chub ni ming tsam nyid dang /
T03D3788:151b-24: yang mi byed pa'i don ni byang chub kyi don yin pa nyid dang /
T03D3788:151b-25: yang de bzhin nyid la sogs pa byang chub yin pa dang /
T03D3788:151b-26: yang ming dang mtshan ma tsam byang chub yin pa dang /
T03D3788:151b-27: yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub yin pa /
T03D3788:151b-28: sangs rgyas rnams kyi mngon bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas
T03D3788:151b-29: pas na byang chub nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bstan
T03D3788:151b-30: pa yin no // dge 'dun dkon mchog la log
T03D3788:151b-31: par rtog pa ni gang shes rab kyi pha rol
T03D3788:151b-32: tu phyin pa la spyod pa nang byang chub la
T03D3788:151b-33: dmigs pa nyid bkag pa dang /
T03D3788:151b-34: de lta yin na pha rol tu phyin pa la
T03D3788:151b-35: sogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa med na de nyid
T03D3788:151b-36: du gnyis kyi spyod pa spangs pa dang /

T03D3788:169b-30: spyan ni mthon mthing spyan rdzi ba mchog gi /'dra ba 'di dag sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan //
T03D3788:169b-32: de la phyag zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang zhes bya ba ni /
T03D3788:169b-33: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil la 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa /
T03D3788:169b-36: rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa /
T03D3788:169b-38: ba so la brkos pa dang 'dra ba skyes par gyur pa mnga' bar gyur pa yin no //
T03D3788:170a-1: mthil sa la mnyam par 'jog cing zhabs 'khums pa med pas zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang /
T03D3788:170a-2: ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mi dra bas 'brel ba dang /
T03D3788:170a-3: phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil shing bal gyi 'dab ma
T03D3788:170a-4: ltar shin tu 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pas phyag
T03D3788:170a-5: dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang /
T03D3788:170a-9: ltag pa'i phyogs mtho ba'i phyir bdun shin tu mtho ba dang /
T03D3788:170a-10: phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ring bas sor mo ring ba dang /
T03D3788:170a-11: rting ba ring bas rting pa yangs pa dang /
T03D3788:170a-12: mtho zhing mdun du 'phags la sku drang bas sku che zhing drang ba nyid dang /
T03D3788:170a-14: long bu mdzes par nub pas na zhabs legs par mtho ba dang /
T03D3788:170a-15: spu gyen du g-yas phyogs su 'khyil bas na spu gyen du phyogs pa dang /
T03D3788:170a-16: ri dags shar ba dang ae na ya'i byin pa
T03D3788:170a-17: lta bu ni drang zhing mnyam la rim gyis gzhol

T03D3788:170a-19: na ya'i byin pa lta bu dang /
T03D3788:170a-20: brla drang por bzhag ste ma btud kyang phyag gnyis
T03D3788:170a-21: kyis pus mo'i lha nga la sleb pas phyag ring
T03D3788:170a-23: glang po che dang rta cang shes ltar gsang ba'i
T03D3788:170a-24: gnas shin tu mdzes par sbubs su nub pas mdoms
T03D3788:170a-25: kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa dang /
T03D3788:170a-26: shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser gyi kha dog dang ldan
T03D3788:170a-27: pas gser gyi kha dog dang 'dra ba nyid dang
T03D3788:170a-28: / gser dang dngul shin tu sbyangs pa ltar 'jam zhing snyoms pa'i mdog tu 'dug pa dang /
T03D3788:170a-29: sku la rdul mi gos pa dang /
T03D3788:170a-31: shin tu rnam par phye ba'i sdu re re nas
T03D3788:170a-32: skyes shing gnyis su med pas sdu re re nas
T03D3788:170a-33: phyogs g-yas su 'khyil pa nyid dang /

T03D3788:170a-39: pa nyid do // mdzod spus zhes bya ba ni
T03D3788:170a-40: spu 'jam zhing dkar ba g-yas phyogs su 'khyil pas
T03D3788:170a-42: sku'i ro stong seng ge dang 'dra ba nyid dang
T03D3788:170b-0: @170b mgur dang rgyud legs par 'brel zhing phrag pa
T03D3788:170b-1: mdzes par grub pas dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa
T03D3788:170b-2: nyid dang / gser gyi gtan pa phyis pa lta
T03D3788:170b-3: 'phrag [?] so legs par 'grub pas thal gong rgyas
T03D3788:170b-4: nyid dang / pa nyid dang / rlung dang mkhris pa dang /
T03D3788:170b-5: bad kan gyis ljags ma nyams pa dang /
T03D3788:170b-6: ro'i dbye ba mkhyen pa nyid dang rnam par shes
T03D3788:170b-7: pa 'dra ba med pas ro bro ba'i mchog mkhyen
T03D3788:170b-8: pa nyid dang / sku'i chu dang zheng 'dom du
T03D3788:170b-9: mnyam pas na n+ya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab
T03D3788:170b-10: pa nyid dang / pa nyid dang / spyi gtsug
T03D3788:170b-11: zlum zhing legs la g-yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang
T03D3788:170b-12: ldan pa'i dbu na nyam zhing legs par grub la
T03D3788:170b-13: blta na mdzes par mnga' bas dbu gtsug tor dang
T03D3788:170b-15: me tog autpala dmar po'i 'dab ma'i ma dog ltar
T03D3788:170b-16: 'dug cing shin tu yangs pas ljags ring zhing srab
T03D3788:170b-17: pa nyid dang / tshangs pa dang ka la ping
T03D3788:170b-18: ka lta bu'i gsung mnga' bas tshangs pa'i dbyangs nyid
T03D3788:170b-19: pa nyid dang / dang / 'gram pa me long
T03D3788:170b-20: gi dkyil 'khor ltar legs par grub cing mdzes par
T03D3788:170b-21: 'khrungs te blta na sdug pas 'gram pa seng ge'i
T03D3788:170b-25: dung gi bcag 'phro ltar shin tu dkar pa'i tshems mnga' bas tshems dkar ba nyid dang /
T03D3788:170b-26: chems la mtho dman med pas tshems mnyam pa nyid dang /
T03D3788:170b-27: tshems bar mtshams dod pa med pas tshems thags bzang ba nyid dang /
T03D3788:170b-28: bla 'og dgye sgu med pas tshems mnyam shing bzhi bcu tshang ba nyid dang /
T03D3788:170b-29: dkar nag gi cha ma 'dres pa dang shin tu
T03D3788:170b-30: rnam par dag cing mdog dmar pos ma g-yogs par
T03D3788:170b-31: spyan dkar nag 'byes pas spyan mtshon mthing nyid dang
T03D3788:170b-32: / rdzi ma steng 'og tu ma 'dzings shing ba'i
T03D3788:170b-33: rdzi ma lta bu mnga' bas na de bzhin gshegs
T03D3788:170b-34: pa'i rdzi ma ba'i lta bu nyid do //
T03D3788:170b-35: 'di la mtshan ni gang gang gis //
T03D3788:170b-36: 'grub par byed pa'o rgyu gang yin /
T03D3788:170b-37: de dang de ni rab rdzogs pas //
T03D3788:170b-40: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku de'i mtshan rnams kyi sngon
T03D3788:170b-41: gyi rgyu las de dang yang dag par grub pas
T03D3788:171a-0: / mtshan yongs su rdzogs par shes @171a * //
T03D3788:171a-2: yang mtshan gang gis sngon rgyu yongs su sbyangs pa'i las de dag gang zhe na /
T03D3788:171a-3: bla ma skyes la sogs pa dang //
T03D3788:171a-4: yang dag blangs la brtan pa dang //
T03D3788:171a-5: bsdu ba bsten dang gya nom pa'i //
T03D3788:171a-6: dngos po sbyin dang gsad bya ba //
T03D3788:171a-7: thar par byed pa dge ba ni ;
T03D3788:171a-8: / yang dag blangs pa spel la sogs //
T03D3788:171a-9: sgrub byed rgyu yi mtshan nyid ni /
T03D3788:171a-10: mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin //
T03D3788:171a-13: bla ma bsu ba dang skyel ba dag dang /
T03D3788:171a-14: chos nyan pa la sdod pa dang /
T03D3788:171a-16: mchod rten la phreng ba dang /
T03D3788:171a-18: bskor ba la sogs byas pa dang //
T03D3788:171a-19: g-yog 'khor byin pas phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur te /
T03D3788:171a-20: de ni 'khor shin tu mnga' ba'i snga ltas so //
T03D3788:171a-21: yi dam la shin tu brtan pas zhabs shin tu gnas pa ste /
T03D3788:171a-22: de ni mi g-yo zhing shin tu brtan pa'i snga ltas te /
T03D3788:171a-23: gang gis rang gis rtogs pa'i chos las gzhan gyis g-yo bar mi nus pa'o //
T03D3788:171a-24: bsdu ba'i dngos po kun tu bsten pas phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel ba ste /
T03D3788:171a-25: de ni myur du 'du ba'i snga ltas te gang
T03D3788:171a-26: gis ma bsdus pa'i sems can rnams myur du sdud
T03D3788:171a-29: btung ba ro zhim zhing bsod pa byin pas phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa dang /
T03D3788:171a-30: bdun shin tu mtho ba ste /
T03D3788:171a-31: de gnyis ni bza' ba dang /
T03D3788:171a-33: btung ba ro zhim zhing bsod pa byin pa'i snga ltas so //
T03D3788:171a-35: srog gi rim gro byas pa dang /
T03D3788:171a-36: srog gcod pa spangs pas sor mo ring ba dang /
T03D3788:171a-38: sku che zhing drang ba dang /
T03D3788:171a-39: sku tshe ring ba'i snga ltas so //
T03D3788:171a-40: dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs pa dang /
T03D3788:171a-41: dge ba bzung ba spel zhing 'grib par ma byas pas /
T03D3788:171a-42: zhabs kyi long bu mi mngon pa nyid dang /
T03D3788:171a-43: sku'i spu gyen du phyogs pa ste /
T03D3788:171a-44: de ni mi mnyam pa'i chos dang ldan pa'am /
T03D3788:171a-45: gdul bya rnams 'dul ba'i snga ltas so //
T03D3788:171a-46: 'dir gdul bya ni gang zhig yang dag par bsdus
T03D3788:171b-0: pa'i sems can gyi khams de yongs su @171b smin
T03D3788:171b-1: par mdzad pa'o // rig pa dang bzo la sogs pa gus par byas te byin pa dang /
T03D3788:171b-2: mchil lham byin pas byin pa ri dags ae na ya lta bu ste /
T03D3788:171b-3: de ni myur du 'dzin pa'i snga ltas te /
T03D3788:171b-4: gang zhig gzhan gyis smras pa'am /
T03D3788:171b-5: brdar byas pa'i don myur du 'dzin pa'o //
T03D3788:171b-6: nor bdog pa la slong mo'i skye bo phyir ma
T03D3788:171b-7: bzlog par sbyin pa la sogs pa byas pas phyag
T03D3788:171b-9: phyag ring zhing drang ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03D3788:171b-10: de la drang ba ni nor bdog cing yod pa
T03D3788:171b-11: blangs pa na sbed pa'i gya gyu med pa'i phyir
T03D3788:171b-12: ro // ring ba ni slang mo ba'i skye bo
T03D3788:171b-13: phyir ma bzlog pa dang skabs rnyed par bya ba'i
T03D3788:171b-14: ro // phyir ro // de ni yo byad mang ba dang /
T03D3788:171b-15: dul ba'i snga ltas so zhes bya ba ni sems
T03D3788:171b-16: la dbang bas ser sna gzhan gyi dbang du mi
T03D3788:171b-18: nyon mongs pa thul bas rnam pa thams cad du
T03D3788:171b-19: mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang ma 'dres pa'i phyir ro
T03D3788:171b-23: bye bar gyur pa'i sems can bsdums pa dang /
T03D3788:171b-24: tshangs par spyod pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang /
T03D3788:171b-25: gsang ba'i tshig yongs su bsrungs pas mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa ste /
T03D3788:171b-26: da ni bu mang ba'i snga ltas so zhes bya
T03D3788:171b-27: ba ni 'khor ba ji srid par sangs rgyas kyi
T03D3788:171b-28: gdung rgyun mi 'chad pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3788:171b-35: pags pa shin tu 'dzam pa ste ;
T03D3788:171b-39: gnas bzang po thob pa'i snga ltas so //
T03D3788:171b-45: sring mo la sogs pa bla ma rnams la ji ltar 'jam par rim gro byas pa dang /
T03D3788:171b-47: bcol ba la bsgo ba rna la ma gzan pas /
T03D3788:171b-48: sbu re re nas g-yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang /
T03D3788:171b-49: zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa ste /
T03D3788:171b-50: de ni mnyam pa med pa'i snga ltas so //
T03D3788:171b-51: mi snyan pa mi zer zhing mi smod par snyan
T03D3788:172a-0: par smra zhing legs par bshad pa la @172a *
T03D3788:172a-1: // mthun par 'dzin pas ro stod seng ge'i lta bu dang /
T03D3788:172a-2: dbung mgo shin tu zlum par grub pa ste /
T03D3788:172a-3: de ni thub pa med pa'i snga ltas so zhes
T03D3788:172a-4: bya ba ni ye shes dang mthu thogs pa med
T03D3788:172a-5: pa'i phyir ro // nad pa rnams la sman dang /
T03D3788:172a-8: phan pa'i zas byin pa dang rim gro byas pas
T03D3788:172a-9: thal gong rgyas pa'o zhes bya ba 'di ni phrag
T03D3788:172a-10: so gnyis kyi phyogs sha rgyas pa yin pa'i phyir
T03D3788:172a-11: ro // ro bro ba'i mchog mkhyen pa zhes bya
T03D3788:172a-12: ba ni rnam par smin pa brnyes pa nges pa
T03D3788:172a-13: nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ljags kyi dbang po
T03D3788:172a-14: ro mi zhim pa dag dang /
T03D3788:172a-15: ljags kyi dbang por phyin pa dang /
T03D3788:172a-16: ro mchog nyid du so sor ba dar par mdzad pa ste /
T03D3788:172a-17: de ni nad nyung ba'i snga ltas so //
T03D3788:172a-22: rgal dka' ba la zam pa dang /
T03D3788:172a-24: gtsug lag khang gi phreng ba dang /
T03D3788:172a-26: gtsug lag khang la sogs pa gzhan mos par bya
T03D3788:172a-27: ba sngon du song zhing bdag gis gzhan la byin
T03D3788:172a-28: pas / shing n+ya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab pa zhes bya ste /
T03D3788:172a-29: phyag gi 'dom brkyang ba'i zheng gi tshad ji tsam pa zhabs nas brtsams te /
T03D3788:172a-30: dbu'i bar du dkyus tshad de tsam kho na yod pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3788:172a-31: dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa ste /
T03D3788:172a-32: de ni mnga' thang chen po brnyes pa'i snga ltas so //
T03D3788:172a-33: yun ring por tshig snyan zhing 'jam pa dang /
T03D3788:172a-34: yid du 'ong ba gsungs pas ljags shin tu yangs
T03D3788:172a-35: shing srab pa zhes bya ba ni bzhed na stong
T03D3788:172a-36: gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ljags
T03D3788:172a-37: kyis khebs par mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3788:172a-38: gsung gcig brjod pas rnam pa du mar go bar mdzad pa'i tshangs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba ni /
T03D3788:172a-39: 'jig rten gyi khams mang po'i nang na bar chad pas /
T03D3788:172a-40: gnas pa'i gdul bya rnams kyi rna ba'i dbang po'i
T03D3788:172a-41: yul du mtshungs par gyur pa'i gsung dbyangs mnga' ba'i
T03D3788:172a-42: phyir ro // de gnyis ni yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung mnga' ba'i snga ltas so //
T03D3788:172a-43: gsung dbyangs yan lag lnga dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni yongs su shes shing /
T03D3788:172a-44: rnam par shes par 'gyur ba dang /
T03D3788:172a-45: mnyan na dga' zhing mi mthun pa med pa nyid dang /
T03D3788:172b-0: @172b zab cing dbyangs rjes su 'gro ba dang /
T03D3788:172b-1: gtang mi bra zhing rnar snyan pa dang /
T03D3788:172b-3: ma 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba ni legs par go bar byed pa'o //
T03D3788:172b-4: de nyid kyi phyir gsal ba zhes bya ste /
T03D3788:172b-5: gdul bya'i skye bo rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rgyud la go bar mdzad pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3788:172b-6: yun ring po nas tshig 'khyal pa spong zhing dus
T03D3788:172b-7: su smra bar gsungs pas na 'gram pa seng ge
T03D3788:172b-8: 'dra ste / de ni tshig kun gyis gzung bar 'os pa'i snga ltas so //
T03D3788:172b-10: brnyas pa med pa nyid kyis 'tsho ba yongs su dag pas /
T03D3788:172b-11: tshems shin tu dkar pa nyid dang /
T03D3788:172b-13: de ni 'khor snga nas bsags pa'i snga ltas so //
T03D3788:172b-14: yun ring po nas bden pa'i tsheg dang /
T03D3788:172b-15: phra ma med pa'i tshig tu spyod pas tshems thags bzang ba dang /
T03D3788:172b-16: tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba ste /
T03D3788:172b-17: de ni 'khor mi phyed pa'i snga ltas so //
T03D3788:172b-18: bang gis 'khyud pa bzhin du nyes par bsam pa med la ma chags mi sdang ba dang /
T03D3788:172b-19: rmongs pa med pa'i mig gis lta lta bas spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang /
T03D3788:172b-20: ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste /
T03D3788:172b-21: de ni kun nas mdzes pa'i snga ltas so zhes
T03D3788:172b-22: bya ba spyan phye ba'i tshul dang chos mthun pa'i
T03D3788:172b-23: phyir ro // skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bstan nas /
T03D3788:172b-24: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu bstan par bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa ni /
T03D3788:172b-25: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par 'du
T03D3788:172b-26: bya ba thams cad las dben pa ste sen mo
T03D3788:172b-27: zangs kyi mdog lta bu dang /
T03D3788:172b-28: gnyen bshes byams pa dang 'dra bar sems can thams
T03D3788:172b-29: cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i thugs mnga' ba
T03D3788:172b-30: ste sen mo mdog snum pa dang /
T03D3788:172b-31: rigs rgyud mthon po 'byung ba ste sen mo mtho ba yin //
T03D3788:172b-32: spyod tshul kha na ma tho ba mi mnga' ba ste sor mo zlum pa yin /
T03D3788:172b-33: dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bsags pa nyid kyis sor mo rgyas pa dang /
T03D3788:172b-34: dge ba'i rtsa ba rim gyis zhugs pa nyid kyis sor mo rnams byin gyis phra ba dang /
T03D3788:172b-35: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phrin las kyi mtha'
T03D3788:172b-36: dang 'tsho ba rab tu bsrungs pas rtsa mi mngon
T03D3788:172b-37: pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa 'grol bar
T03D3788:172b-38: mdzad pa nyid kyis rtsa ma dud pa med pa
T03D3788:173a-0: pa dang / dang / chos shin tu @173a * //
T03D3788:173a-1: gtsang ba'i blo gros can nyid kyis long bu mi mngon pa nyid dang /
T03D3788:173a-2: bgrod dka' ba'i gnas thams cad las sgrol bar mdzad
T03D3788:173a-3: pa nyid kyis zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa dang
T03D3788:173a-4: / mi'i seng ge nyid kyis ni seng ge'i stabs su bzhud pa nyid dang /
T03D3788:173a-5: mi'i glang po nyid kyis glang po che'i stabs su gshegs pa nyid dang /
T03D3788:173a-6: ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha' la gshegs pa
T03D3788:173a-7: nyid kyis ngang pa'i rgyal po'i stabs su gshegs par
T03D3788:173a-9: mi'i khyu mchog tu gyur pa nyid kyis khyu mchog gi stabs su gshegs pa nyid dang /
T03D3788:173a-10: skor phyogs kyi lam dang mthun par gshegs pa nyid
T03D3788:173a-11: kyis g-yas phyogs su ldog cing gshegs pa nyid dang
T03D3788:173a-12: / blta na mdzes pa ste mdzes par gshegs pa nyid dang /
T03D3788:173a-13: rtag tu thugs yon po mi mnga' ba ste drang por gshegs pa nyid dang /
T03D3788:173a-14: yon tan yang dag par brjod pa nyid kyis sku 'khril bag chags pa nyid dang /
T03D3788:173a-15: sdig pa'i chos dang ma sbags pa nyid kyis sku byi dor byas pa lta bu nyid dang /
T03D3788:173a-16: gdul bya dang 'tsham par chos ston par mdzad pa nyid kyis sku rim par 'tsham pa nyid dang /

T03D3788:173a-22: chos 'dul ba yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir mtshan rdzogs pa nyid dang /

T03D3788:173a-24: thams cad la thugs snyoms pa'i phyir /
T03D3788:173a-25: gom pa snyoms pa nyid dang /
T03D3788:173a-26: rnam par dag pa'i chos ston pa'i phyir /
T03D3788:173a-27: spyan rnam par dag pa nyid dang /
T03D3788:173a-28: chos shin tu go sla ba ston pa'i phyir /
T03D3788:173a-29: sku shin tu gzhon sha can nyid dang ;
